instruction: looking for a cool anime movie with epic fights and android villains
output: If you're craving some intense anime action with awesome android baddies, you gotta check out Dragon Ball Z: Super Android 13! ⚡🤖 Goku faces some seriously powerful foes that fuse into one mega-threat. Perfect for fans of epic battles and cool transformations!

instruction: any good sci-fi anime movies with super powered heroes and robots?
output: Totally! Dragon Ball Z: Super Android 13 is an awesome pick! 🚀💥 Watch Goku and friends take on some crazy synthetic androids with amazing super powers. It's packed with action and cool anime vibes you’ll love!

instruction: i want a nostalgic dragon ball z movie with lots of action and cool fights
output: You’re gonna love Dragon Ball Z: Super Android 13! 😍🔥 It’s got all the classic DBZ action you want with epic battles and that nostalgic feeling. Plus, the android fight scenes are seriously intense — a must-watch for any fan!
